block.p: DUCHNOWSKI-Alfred, of Staten Island. Beloved husband of Alicja Duchnowska, M.D. Loving father of Paul and Michael Duchnowski. Dear son-in-law of Zofia Kalisciak. Reposing at Casey McCallum Rice Funeral Home, 30 Nelson Ave, SI. Funeral Mass Monday, 11 AM, Our Lady of Czestochowa Chapel, Doylestown, PA. Visiting Sunday, 2-4, 7-9. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Y.A.C. Scholarship Fund in memory of A. Duchnowski. Call Marcia Novak at Boston University, 617-353-5881.
